price: [But they killed him], so he was told[6], “Enter Paradise.” He said, “If only my people knew[7]
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [6] After he was martyred for the sake of Allah. [7] He said so after Allah admitted him into paradise and he saw the pleasures therein.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
